title: Implement PIIRedactor Stub
description: Implement a PIIRedactor stub in Lane C that can scan transcript or response metadata for potential PII and redact or flag as configured. Ensure redacted content is used in audit logs and tool calls as appropriate.
acceptance_criteria: PIIRedactor scans input text for PII patterns (stubbed)
Redacted output is used for audit and tool call events
Policy decision events include PII reason_codes when detected
Stub supports future expansion with more robust detection
